name: Bide
specialMechanics: User takes damage for two turns then strikes back double

name: Bind
specialMechanics: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns

name: Clamp
specialMechanics: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns

name: Constrict
specialMechanics: May lower opponent's Speed by one stage

name: Counter
specialMechanics: When hit by a Physical Attack, user strikes back with 2x power

name: Dig
specialMechanics: Digs underground on first turn, attacks on second

name: Earthquake
specialMechanics: Power is doubled if opponent is underground from using Dig

name: Fly
specialMechanics: Flies up on first turn, attacks on second turn

name: High Jump Kick
specialMechanics: If it misses, the user loses half their HP

name: Jump Kick
specialMechanics: If it misses, the user loses half their HP

name: Leech Life
specialMechanics: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent

name: Low Kick
specialMechanics: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack

name: Pay Day
specialMechanics: Money is earned after the battle

name: Seismic Toss
specialMechanics: Inflicts damage equal to user's level

name: Skull Bash
specialMechanics: Raises Defense on first turn, attacks on second

name: Sky Attack
specialMechanics: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May cause flinching. High critical hit ratio

name: Struggle
specialMechanics: Only usable when all PP are gone. Hurts the user

name: Super Fang
specialMechanics: Always takes off half of the opponent's HP

name: Thrash
specialMechanics: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused

name: Twineedle
specialMechanics: Hits twice in one turn. May poison opponent

name: Wrap
specialMechanics: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns

name: Absorb
specialMechanics: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent

name: Dream Eater
specialMechanics: User recovers half the HP inflicted on a sleeping opponent

name: Fire Spin
specialMechanics: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns

name: Gust
specialMechanics: Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce/Sky Drop with double power

name: Mega Drain
specialMechanics: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent

name: Night Shade
specialMechanics: Inflicts damage equal to user's level

name: Petal Dance
specialMechanics: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused

name: Razor Wind
specialMechanics: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. High critical hit ratio

name: Solar Beam
specialMechanics: Charges on first turn, attacks on second

name: Tri Attack
specialMechanics: May paralyze, burn or freeze opponent

name: Conversion
specialMechanics: Changes user's type to that of its first move

name: Disable
specialMechanics: Opponent can't use its last attack for a few turns

name: Growth
specialMechanics: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack

name: Leech Seed
specialMechanics: Drains HP from opponent each turn

name: Light Screen
specialMechanics: Halves damage from Special attacks for 5 turns

name: Metronome
specialMechanics: User performs almost any move in the game at random

name: Mirror Move
specialMechanics: User performs the opponent's last move

name: Mist
specialMechanics: User's stats cannot be changed for a period of time

name: Recover
specialMechanics: User recovers half its max HP

name: Reflect
specialMechanics: Halves damage from Physical attacks for 5 turns

name: Rest
specialMechanics: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed

name: Roar
specialMechanics: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs

name: Soft-Boiled
specialMechanics: User recovers half its max HP

name: Substitute
specialMechanics: Uses HP to create a decoy that takes hits

name: Teleport
specialMechanics: Allows user to flee wild battles; also warps player to last PokéCenter

name: Transform
specialMechanics: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent

name: Whirlwind
specialMechanics: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs
